languages.text: "Также здесь трудится наряд блюстителей, команда инфернусов, клерки, что ведут учет грузов, и медикарий. Хороший малый, всякому лекарству предпочитает пулю, да простит его Бог-Император".

"Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."
languages.original_text: "Также здесь трудится наряд блюстителей, команда инфернусов, клерки, что ведут учет грузов, и медикарий. Хороший малый, всякому лекарству предпочитает пулю, да простит его Бог-Император".

traits.locale_text: "Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

"Others working here include an enforcer squad, a team of infernus scoundrels, clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose favourite choice of medicine is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

"Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of infernus filth, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

"Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

languages.text: «También tenemos un escuadrón de guardias, un equipo de infernus, los burócratas que mantienen los registros de carga y un oficial de medicae. Es un buen hombre cuya medicina preferida es la bala, que el Dios Emperador le perdone».
languages.original_text: "Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

traits.locale_text: «También tenemos un escuadrón de guardias, un equipo de infernus, los burócratas que mantienen los registros de carga y un oficial de medicae. Es un buen hombre cuya medicina preferida es la bala, que el Dios Emperador le perdone».

languages.text: 「ここの作業員には、エンフォーサー部隊、インフェルヌスチーム、貨物記録を管理する事務員、そしてメディケア士官もいます。薬といえば弾薬という優秀な男です。神帝陛下がお許しくださいますように」
languages.original_text: "Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

traits.locale_text: 「ここの作業員には、エンフォーサー部隊、インフェルヌス汚物チーム、貨物記録を管理する事務員、そしてメディケア士官もいます。薬といえば弾薬という優秀な男です。神帝陛下がお許しくださいますように」

languages.text: “此外，这片甲板还配备了一支执法者小队、一支控火行会小队、负责记录货物的文员，以及一位医务官。他是个不错的家伙，最喜欢开的药方是子弹，愿神皇宽恕他。”
languages.original_text: "Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

traits.locale_text: “此外，这片甲板还配备了一支执法者小队、一支控火行会小队、负责记录货物的文员，以及一位医务官。他是个不错的家伙，最喜欢开的药方是子弹，愿神皇宽恕他。”

languages.text: "Außerdem haben wir hier eine Einheit von Enforcern, eine Team von Inferni, einige Buchhalter für die Frachtberichte und einen Medicae-Offizier. Ein guter Mann, dessen bevorzugtes Medikament eine Kugel ist, der Gottimperator möge ihm verzeihen."
languages.original_text: "Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

traits.locale_text: "Außerdem haben wir hier eine Einheit von Enforcern, eine Team von Inferni, einige Buchhalter für die Frachtberichte und einen Medicae-Offizier. Ein guter Mann, dessen bevorzugtes Medikament eine Kugel ist, der Gottimperator möge ihm verzeihen."

languages.text: « Vous trouverez également ici une escouade de prévôts, une équipe d'inferni, les clercs chargés des registres et un officier de medicae, dont le remède préféré consiste à cribler le patient de balles, que l'Empereur-Dieu le pardonne. »
languages.original_text: "Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."

traits.locale_text: « Vous trouverez également ici une escouade de prévôts, une équipe d'inferni, les clercs chargés des registres et un officier de medicae, dont le remède préféré consiste à cribler le patient de balles, que l'Empereur-Dieu le pardonne. »

languages.text: "Ayrıca burada bir infazcı mangası, bir itfacı ekibi, kargo kayıtlarını tutan kâtipler ve bir sıhhiye subayı da görev yapıyor. Subayın ilaç tercihi mermiden yana olsa da iyi bir delikanlıdır. Tanrı İmparator onu affetsin."
languages.original_text: "Also employed here are an enforcer squad, a team of inferni, the clerks who keep cargo records, and a medicae officer. A fine chap whose medicine of choice is a bullet, may the God-Emperor forgive him."
